en.title: Ocean View Escape: Infinity Pool & Private Balcony
en.description: Enjoy this beautiful apartment with a private balcony and breathtaking ocean view. Relax in the infinity pool or stroll down to Costa Azul Beach, a true paradise for surf lovers. Located in an exclusive private community with 24/7 security, immaculate gardens, and free parking. We will be delighted to assist you so you can enjoy a comfortable stay full of unforgettable moments. Book today and live the dream of waking up to magical sunrises and stunning ocean views!
